revision.text: Possibly: Discourses preached on several occasions. By John Erskine, D.D. One of the ministers of the Old Grayfriars Church, Edinburgh. (Edinburgh: Printed for William Creech and Archibald Constable, and C. Dilly, T. Cadell, W. Davies, and T. Kay, London, 1798). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2421935~S1
